issue.title: [Java] MapWithOrdinal javadoc doesn't describe actual behaviour
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8947](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8947). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
MapWithOrdinal states that ordinals are recycled when keys are removed, it does not currently do this and grows unbounded
